title: No children node listing when changing data source for a data set in the data set editor page of the query tab
OB: No children node listed when changing the data source for a data set in the data set editor page of the query tab
EB: The children nodes should be listed when changing the data source for a data set in the data set editor page of the query tab
SR:
1. Create a new data set without a SQL statement
2. Open the data set editor
3. Go to the data source page and change the data source
4. Verify that the new data source shows the database, table, and column information
5. Close the data set editor
6. Reopen the data set editor and verify that the children nodes are listed
